explanation: Funds are required to liquidate necessary ship cost increases resulting from material inflation and labor rate adjustments on USNS POINT LOMA (EPF 15). This will result in a total cost of $266.3

Funds are available due to funds being excess to program requirements. The USS DELBERT D BLACK (DDG 119) delivered in April 2020. The ship completed its post-shakedown availability in July 2021 and reached the obligation and work limiting date on August 31, 2021.
